entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Trois-Pistoles

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
